oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Tillman Gray
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Tillman Gray. He enlisted with the Confederates in Co. B, 42nd Tenn. Inf. Regt. Gray was captured at Fort Donelson on February 16, 1862. He taken to Camp Douglas, Ill., and later sent to Vicksburg, Miss. Gray was wounded at the Battle of Franklin in November 1864.
